description: Tomcat dashboard using metrics from prometheus JMX exporter, with drill down per job > instance

panels.description: Current size (in kilobytes) of the combined web apps cache
panels.title: WebResource Cache Size

panels.description: Maximum size (in kilobytes) that a resource can be to cached.  Careful, showing the largest configured cache across all web apps, which may not be the one that you're watching.
panels.title: Max. Cache Size

panels.description: Maximum size (in kilobytes) that a resource can be to cached.  Careful, dashboard shows max across all web apps which may not be the one you are watching.
panels.title: Max. Object Size

panels.description: Approximate time (in milliseconds) that an object will persist in the cache.  Careful, showing maximum TTL setting across all registered web apps which may not be the web app you're watching.
panels.title: Cache TTL

targets.expr:
(sum( increase(tomcat_processingtime_total{namespace=~"$namespace",job=~"$job",app=~"$app",instance=~"$instance",pod=~"$pod",protocol=~"$protocol",port=~"$port"}[$__rate_interval]) ) by (instance, pod, port))
    /
(sum(increase(tomcat_requestcount_total{namespace=~"$namespace",job=~"$job",app=~"$app",instance=~"$instance",pod=~"$pod",protocol=~"$protocol",port=~"$port"}[$__rate_interval]) ) by (instance, pod, port))

panels.description: WARNING: the present instrumentation does not allow adding the protocol label to this metric, and hence it will not filter as the others based on the interface.
panels.title: WebSocket Message Rate

panels.description: Top 4 servlets average processing time per request in last 5 minutes
panels.title: Top 5 servlets average processing time per request

options.content:
Dashboard version: 2.1\
Instrumentation: JMX Exporter installed in JVM as Java agent\
JMX Exporter configuration: Custom configuration (shared) adding specific MBean attributes\
Enhanced by: Greg Eva - Enterprise Architecture Community Lead, PTC\
Contact e-mail: geva@ptc.com

title: Apache Tomcat
